events.name: I/O Extended 2017 Lafia
events.description: I/O Extended events bring local developer communities together to experience the I/O keynote and sessions with one another in real-time, around the globe. Extended events also offer unique activities such as hackathons, codelabs, and demos. Ours is a delayed(extended) viewing party where we will be watching all the exciting announcements from both the General Keynote targeted at End Users and business partners as well as the Developers Keynote where  latest news and updates to Google's developer products and platforms will be announced.  We will also be having tech talk sessions from 2 speakers as well as an hour long codelab session. Please do RSVP to attend, see you there.

events.name: Pre-Devfest Meetup
events.description: We will be preparing for our participation at #Devfest17 #Abuja. Assembling a team for our hackathon and identifying a problem we will solve. We will also be discussing on our Upcoming Mobile Web/PWA Study Jam.

events.name: North Central DevFest Abuja
events.description:
GDG DevFests are large, community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas, all-day hack-a-thons, code labs, and more. North Central DevFest 2017 will be organized as a typical DevFest in the Month of November featuring Speakers from our cluster of participating chapters and the community at large to attain a bigger and impactful event in the developer community. Register to attend the event at https://bit.ly/devfestabuja-rsvp. 

More Details on the event and speakers list at https://ncdevfest.com

events.name: Lets Git The Right Way
events.description:
• What we'll do
We will discuss how to use version control systems properly, from keeping track of file changes to writing valid commit messages to merging to development branch and resolving merge conflicts.

• What to bring
Laptops, Pen and Papers

• Important to know

events.name: Mobile Site Study Jam Lafia
events.description:
As you know, the web is one of our core technology pillars. A key way of educating our community and spreading know how on key technologies like mobile speed, PWA, AMP and web payments is through the Mobile Site Certification Study Jam.

Today over 50% of web traffic goes to mobile yet, developers aren’t designing effectively for it. For example, 53% of mobile visitors will leave if a page takes more than three seconds to load. The average page takes 19 seconds to load over 3G. Speed is just one part of creating better mobile experiences and best practice has gone a long way past responsive design alone. Are you up to date? Join us as we explore ways in which you can design apps that will perform excellently on this set of devices.

events.name: IWD Lafia 2018
events.description:
We are proud to be hosting the 2018 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference. This event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

At IWD '18 Lafia we will be sharing our stories and other women who have been making waves in technology, thereby trying to build a new horizon, this way we can encourage other ladies to join the STEM field From Ada Lovelace to Grace Hopper among others. We will also be having a codelab session where participants will get their hands dirty with codelab prepared by the Google Cloud team, so get prepared.

Our schedule is as thus:

09:00 - 09:30am
Registration and Tag Collection
09:30 - 09:45am
Introducing IWD/ WTM/Lesson Learnt from WTM Summit Lagos
09:45 - 10:30am
Tea Break
10:30 - 11:00am
Being a Developer: My Story
11:00 - 11:30am
Women and STEM: Improving Our Numbers
11:30-12:00am
Video Clip from an Inspirational Women in Tech
11:30 - 12:00am
Exploring Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence
12:00 - 12:30
Lunch/Networking
12:30 - 2:50pm
GCP Codelabs
2:50-3:00pm
Group picture

events.name: Pre Devfest Meetup
events.description: We will be updating members on the preparations ongoing for the North Central Devfest 2018.

events.name: DevFest Abuja 2018
events.description: GDG DevFest 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, code labs, hackathon and more! #Devfest18 #Abuja will have 5 chapters clustering to make this the best hosted so far, Pictures from #Devfest17 can be found at https://photos.app.goo.gl/ExTDoMdQujsDwV5p1. More details of this event can be found at https://ncdevfest.com

events.name: Flutter Viewing Party Lafia
events.description: This is an event that will give attendees to experience the latest from Flutter, Google’s free and open source SDK for building high-quality native iOS and Android apps from a single codebase. We will be looking through the advancement of the Flutter and our attendees will get introduced to building native apps with Flutter

events.name: DevFest 2018 Lafia
events.description: The event is the biggest tech event in Lafia, our team works hard to make DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere. We will be featuring contents in software development covering Android, Web and Cloud technologies.

events.name: Cloud Study Jam Lafia
events.description: Cloud Study Jam Lafia is aimed at introducing our community members the fundamental tools and capabilities of Google Cloud. As our attendee, you will receive free access to online labs. We will choose any of our recommended tracks to run with your community: Machine Learning, Kubernetes, Certification, IoT, and Security.

events.name: IWD'19 Lafia
events.description:
IWD is aimed at celebrating great women who have made contributions in technology across the world. Thereby giving young women reasons to embrace tech as well as empowering those who are passionate about tech. Attendees should come with their laptops as there would be a codelabs session on what's new in technology. Like
Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

events.name: IO19 Extended Lafia

events.name: Kotlin Everywhere Lafia
events.description: We are having a full day of Kotlin and everything it entails, from how you can build cross platform apps to how you can write a mix of Java and Kotlin in your Android app development. We also will be looking at Kotlin JVM and Kotlin JS. See you there.
events.how_to_find_us: We are hosting this at the HND Lab of the Computer science Department.

events.name: DEVFEST 2019 Lafia
events.description:
GDG DevFests are community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas and technologies, including hack-a-thons, codelabs, and more.

The event is the biggest tech event in Lafia, our team work hard to make DevFest an awesome experience and a phenomenal atmosphere. We will be featuring contents in software development covering Android, Web and Cloud technologies.

events.name: Flutter Interact Lafia, 2019
events.description:
Join us for a day of creation and collaboration with the world, broadcasted live from Brooklyn NY.
With viewing parties around the world, everyone can be a part of this interactive event that focuses on sharing ideas, experimenting and crafting beautiful experiences across devices.
We’ll showcase the latest from Google Design and Flutter, Google’s free and open source UI toolkit to build beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop - all from a single codebase.

upcoming.name: Firebase Study Jam Lafia
upcoming.description:
Want to get started building web apps? Learn how to do that with Firebase!
Join us for our Firebase Study Jam! Together we'll work through Firebase for web codelabs prepared by Google instructors. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Firebase…..

organizers.name: Auwal M.
organizers.bio: Ardent Learner, Lover of Engineering and Communities. Jollof rice is Bae

group_profile.intro:
Hi all,
I am Auwal MS, I work as a Software Engineering Consultant at Intellectual Apps, an IT Consultancy shop that proffer web and mobile solutions based in Abuja, Nigeria. I am also the community manager of this group.
